category.title: Omelettes
category.description:
All omelettes are made with three farm fresh eggs and served with choice of toast and hand-cut home fries or tossed salad. Replace home fries for fruit salad $2.00. Egg whites are optional for all omelettes $ 2.00
Bread options: Whole Wheat, Scali, Rye, Multi-grain. Gluten-free add $2.00

meals.title: Queens
meals.description: Slow roasted shredded pulled pork with peppers, onions, house made BBQ sauce and melted cheddar cheese.

meals.title: The Liberty
meals.description: Signature sausage, apple wood smoked bacon, diced ham, sautéed peppers and onion with melted American cheese.

meals.title: The Carnegie
meals.description: Filled with house made corned beef hash and melted cheddar cheese.

meals.title: Manhattan
meals.description: Our House-made chili and melted cheddar cheese, topped with sour cream.

note.title: Bread Options:
note.description: Whole wheat, Scali, White, Rye, Glunten-free $2.00, Multi-grain.

meals.title: Brooklyn
meals.description: Pepper, onions, salsa, avocado, pepper jack cheese and a side of sour cream.

meals.title: Central Park
meals.description: Broccoli, pepper, tomato, onion, spinach, sparagus, and Swiss cheese.

meals.title: Build Your Own Omelette
meals.description: Three eggs, one meet, two vegetables and one cheese come with house toast and home fries or tossed salad. Add extra meet for $2, extra cheese $1.50, Avocado $1.99 vegetable $1, extra egg $0.99

options.title: Choose Veg
options.description: Tomato, Mushrooms, Asparagus, Carrots, Broccoli, Spinach, Onions and Peppers

options.title: Choose Cheese
options.description: American, Cheddar, Fetta, Swiss, Pepper Jack, Gouda, Goat Cheese, Mozarella.

options.title: Choose Meat
options.description: Bacon, Ham, Sausage, Corn-beef Hash, Steak, Turkey, Smoked Salmon, Chicken.

category.title: Benedit
category.description: All New Yorker Benedict’s are made with farm fresh eggs and served with house made home fries or tossed salad. Replace home fries for Fruit Salad $2.00

meals.title: 4th Avenue
meals.description: Two poached farm fresh eggs served over our toasted english muffin with Smoked Salmon, scallions and our lemon zest hollandaise sauce.

meals.title: The Broadway
meals.description: Two poached farm fresh eggs served over our toasted english muffin with Canadian bacon and topped with our lemon zest Hollandaise Sauce.

meals.title: Times Square
meals.description: Two poached farm fresh eggs topped with shredded slow roasted BBQ pulled pork.  Served over toasted english muffin and drizzled with our lemon zest hollandaise sauce.

meals.title: Rockefeller Benny
meals.description: House made corned beef hash  homemade lemon zest  hollandaise sauce two poached eggs on homemade corned bread.

meals.title: The Bronx
meals.description: Baby spinach and cut thick sliced grilled fresh tomatoes topped with house made lemon zest hollandaise sauce two poached eggs.

category.title: Pancakes
category.description: All pancakes are served with vermont maple syrup, whipped cream and butter. Add chocolate chips, banana, blueberry, strawberry, nutella, roasted coconut, ($1.25) each.

meals.title: Butter Milk
meals.description: A delicious full stack of butter milk pancakes. You can choose a stack of two for $5.99 or a single for $3.99

meals.title: Sweet Potato
meals.description: A choice of two for $6.99, and one for $3.99

meals.title: Thunder Storm
meals.description: Pecan, roasted pears,melted mascarpone cheese, topped with homemade caramel sauce.

meals.title: New Yorker Fried Potato
meals.description: Crispy shredded potato pancakes with a bit of onion and spice. Served with  sour cream and applesauce.
